data.name: Winter Ember - Digital Comic: Issues 0-4
data.detailed_description:
Winter Ember Digital Comic: Issues 0-4

Files will be placed in the Steam directory: ...\Steam\SteamApps\common\Winter Ember\Winter Ember - Digital Comic

The first five issues of a prequel graphic novel, set before the events of the Winter Ember game. Experience a gripping plot written by Kevin Grevioux and lavishly drawn art by Chris Awayan and Ben Herrera.
Meet Arthur Artorias before the massacre which claimed his family and fortune, and left him a faceless shadow hell-bent on revenge. Witness the night where his life was forever changed, and the years of exile that forged him into a deadly assassin.
